messages.subject: "You were supposed to sing and dance"
messages.msgSnippet: This follows just perfectly on a discussion from the drive back from Colorado yesterday, and it was just sent to me by Carelia.  THANK YOU!!!! It s the
messages.messageBody:
This follows just perfectly on a discussion from the drive back from
Colorado yesterday, and it was just sent to me by Carelia. THANK
YOU!!!!

It's the recording of a Alan Watts talking about "Music and
Life" (kind of--it's more about school and jobs and expectations,
but it's short and beautiful an dillustrated by simple animation by
Matt Stone and Trey Parker)

The note I got is below, but I looked and there are others!!!:
http://www.freshminds.com/animation/alan_watts_prickles.html
The animation is very, very cute and useful to the concept (for me,
anyway, and maybe for some others who like to do two things at once)

Sandra
=======================================


thought of you when I watched it. :)

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ERbvKrH-GC4



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
